name: Universe Balancing Bureau
description:
Universe Balancing Bureau is a mini puzzle game in space
where you wire up planetary systems and space stations.

You're a Balancing Agent of the bureau in charge of doing so.
Decide how many planets can be fed with resources from another
and make smart use of the space stations provided by the bureau
to finish the job at hand.



  • 2 campaigns with 4 levels each
  • 1 bonus level straight from the Ludum Dare 38
  • a secret and very hidden way of creating your own campaigns and levels
  • absolutely funky music!
